obj_dw_churchc_prophecies_slash_Step_0_g: * Before the clock strikes midnight^1, the shadow will grow!/
* O^1, the shadow will grow^1, serpentine!/%
* Even when the clock ran back^1, the shadow was growing!/
* A patch of shadow^1, slithering on^1, slithering on^1, serpentine!/
* ..^1. So sayeth our ancestors. Crazy fellows^1, the lot!/%
